The great & dreadful day of the Lord God almighty (which is hastening as a flood upon the whole world of the ungodly once more proclaimed that all people may again be warned to repent with speed and to be left without excuse. Bayly, William, d. 1675.
[8] p.
s.n., [London? : 1664?]
Caption title. Signed: William Bayly. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
